alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 12:59PM AKST until December 12 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Kuskokwim Valley. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... A band of moderate snow will develop first over Bristol Bay and then spread northeast into the Lower Kuskokwim Valley tonight. This is anticipated to be a long duration event, with steady snowfall not expected to end until the low pushes into the northern Gulf Coast.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
